channel.title: Certifications on Stanley Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Certifications on Stanley Zheng

item.title: How well do you know your Cloud?
item.description: Back in May, I shared on Linkedin that I received my Google Cloud Architect certification. It was probably my most shared post ever on the platform. A week later, I attained the Data Engineer certification and at the beginning of July, the Associate Cloud Engineer. I ventured to guess that I was the first engineer at Cloudreach to get all three. I get a few common questions and I hoped to answer all here:
